profile:
Our Clients are #1 priority so we truly believe in high business ethics as far as relations with our clients are concerned. We strongly intend to develop a closer trust based on a long-term business relationship with our clients. Equally important to us is that our quality of products delivered matches the quality of our service. Our furniture is well maintained and spotless. If an item in our collection is damaged, ripped, broken or stained… it does NOT leave our showroom.
When you team up with Stagers Choice, you get more than a catalog of fine furniture, you get a team of professionals willing to go beyond to help you with your project and make your experience with us efficient & profitable.

We have flexible prices & lease terms and delivery all over GTA is available within 24 hours.

profile:
Founded in 2019, we are one of the fastest growing home staging startup in Toronto and GTA.

While there are many staging companies on the market, none of them provides the staging quality per dollar we are looking for when we are trying to sell our own property. As such, we see an opportunity to create a better company that provides outstanding staging quality and value than what was available on the market.

R3 Home Staging specializes in providing the highest staging quality per dollar. We strongly believe this is the best way to deliver the best value to our clients.

Through a long streak of wildly successful projects and word of mouth, we are growing faster than we ever anticipated. We believe our integrity, core values and unique presentation styles play a strong part in our rapid growth.

R3 Home Staging provides differentiating designs to showcase a property’s strengths. We understand the market and consistently helps our clients achieve record breaking sale prices in many neighborhoods across GTA.

What makes R3 Home Staging different is we do not cut corners. We treat each property like our own and work diligently to ensure each of our projects meet our high bar of quality and exceptional presentation.

R3 Home Staging
(647) 928-6588
info@r3homestaging.com

profile:
Junk Army is an affordable junk removal service in the city of Toronto and the surrounding area. We strive to reduce the costs of our service by recycling and donating as much of your junk as possible. This helps the environment and reduces the the cost of dumping your junk. We forward those savings to our customers. 

Give us a try, and we will exceed your expectations. Estimates are free and our prices are highly competitive.
products:
We offer junk, waste, rubbish, and garbage removal to the entire greater Toronto area. Including, Newmarket, Aurora, Richmond Hill, Thornhill, Maple, Stouffville, North York, Scarborough, Ajax, Pickering, Whitby, Oshawa, Bowmanville, Etobicoke, Toronto, Mississauga, Oakville, Brampton and Burlington.

We are the only junk removal company that offers you a rebate for your items that can be either recycled or donated.
services:
We charge you by the volume of junk you need removed. Pricing is up-front, and estimates are free. Our estimates are on-site and no obligation. 

Our rates include all labor, equipment, and dumping costs. 

When you order JUNK ARMY, you get two friendly and strong, uniformed employees. Just sit back and relax, while we do all the heavy lifting. 

We offer same day removal service!
We offer rebates for donation items and recyclable materials. 
Eco - Friendly junk removal!

profile:
Styled Interiors is a full service decorating and staging company. We create liveable modern spaces designed with intention.  

Staging is one of our favourite service offerings.  Staging is not decorating. We use specific design elements to create design strategies  that will position your home in the best possible manner to attract buyers. Coupled with our experience in renovations, we have established relationships with various trades to provide home improvements. 

Our experience has taught us that our clients benefit most from full service design and we have incorporated this as our standard practice. We are obsessed with the details, communicate often on project progress and ensure that your vision is executed properly. From design concept, to finishes selection, to furniture selections, custom millwork or furniture design and more, we handle all the details until all is installed.
services:
Interior Design
Interior Decorating
Condo Renovations

profile: Stanton Interiors is an accomplished Interior Design and Decor company serving the Toronto area since 2005. Our specialty services include condominium Interior Design and Decor, condominium renovations, project management, staging and downsizing. Many of our projects include Toronto's 'Top Ten Condominium Residences'. We guarantee our discerning clients a ‘worry free’ renovation experience from the planning stage, through the renovation stage, to the decorating stage. Our team of reputable Condominium Renovation Associates are experienced in Condominium settings, are reliable, and are fully insured. Mary Stanton, B.A.& M.Ed., is the creative director of Stanton Interiors. She is innovative, client-focused, and committed to providing excellent service and workmanship. Mary and her team of talented associates are capable of implementing innovative solutions for any design or decorating challenge. Our priority is to make use of sustainable products available from local manufacturers and craftsmen. Interior Design & Décor - Kitchen & Bath renovations, Floor plans and scale drawings, Colour consultation, Custom furnishings, Custom Window coverings & Bedding, Flooring, Lighting, Wall & Ceiling treatments, Custom millwork, Décor accessories & Silk floral arrangements Condominium Renovation Project Management - Plan & establish budgets, Attain approval from Condominium Boards & Management, Schedule trades & booking the service elevator, Supervise the trades, delivery of materials, & the removal of debris, Work evaluation & Approval meetings, Written reports Staging - Prepare living spaces for optimum re-sale value, De-cluttering, placing furniture, & decorating, One room or Complete Home packages available, Re-Cycle, Re-Use, Re-Design, Using existing furnishings Downsizing - Assist clients planning a move from a home to a smaller Condominium, Evaluate which furnishings are suitable for the new space, Provide floor plans, Place furniture & Décor items, Assist Seniors who are re-locating to a new home
services: Interior Design & Decor, Condominium Renovations, Staging & Downsizing
name: Stanton Interiors

profile: Get a fresh start at staging your home with Designscape's exclusive Home Staging Packages. A GTA based home staging company, Designscape specializes in speed, proficiency and a deep rooted understanding of what it takes to sell a home in today's competitive marketplace. At Designscape, we understand that while your home is on the market, time is of the essence. Our no nonsense approach to unique home design is fast, efficient and cost effective, maximizing your profits without the stress. Our designers will work with your existing furniture, or stage your vacant suite to make it feel cared for and lived in. We are specialized in modifying our programme to best suit your needs; from basic home repairs to fresh flowers, we have what it takes to make your space HGTV beautiful. Are you ready for your close up?
